subject: I am bringing this notice to y
body:
I am bringing this notice to you today. today is the last day I
will contact you for this fund. We have signed and  sealed all the
papers related to this delivery to you that we should return this atm
card worth $10.5m to the Federal Treasury Department. I am no more waiting
for you for this delivery but bear it in mind that if you still want
this atm card to be delivered to your house that you should rush now
and send this last fee of $50 and have your ATM card delivered to you.
Failure to send the fees today, then forget about this ATM card
because by tomorrow, it will be government own. Do not blame me for
anything as i have waited too much.
If you are blocked from using western union or money gram then go and
buy iTunes card and send. Make sure you do it today if you really want
your ATM card but failure to do it today then you will lose your
funds. I have tried and can not continue waiting or writing you day by
day
I swear If I fail to release your payment after you send the $50.00 as
I promise don't count on me again, I cannot fail you, I promise you
donâ€™t fear as soon as you send the $50.00 today please leave the rest
to me and see if I am lying to you because I can not use my life swear
because of $50.00, how can I swear against my life because of this
small amount? it is to show you that I am telling you the truth.
So 
you are advised to go right now to the Walmart and get me
Steam card of $50 so that i can proceed and get
everything done Asap
I promise you as soon as I hear from you with the payment of $50 Apple
gift card or Steam card. Today i shall send your pick up information
the same day you send the $50.00 Steam wallet card or iTunes card I swear to God
Yours Faithfully,
Mr. David Larry

subject: Re: I am bringing this notice to y
body:
Hello Mr. David Larry,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information about the ATM card. I appreciate you bringing it to my attention. Can you please provide me with more details about the purpose of this card and how it is connected to the Federal Treasury? I want to make sure I understand everything correctly before taking any further steps.

Additionally, could you clarify why there is a need for me to purchase a Steam card or Apple gift card? How does that relate to the delivery of the ATM card? I just want to ensure that I have all the necessary information before proceeding.

Thank you again for your assistance in this matter.

Best wishes,
Houston
